mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portal_user (email, password, first_name, last_name, access_token, role, activated ) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{accessToken}, #{role}, #{activated})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as "u.id", u.email as "u.email", u.password as "u.password", u.first_name as "u.first_name", u.last_name as "u.last_name", u.access_token as "u.access_token", u.activated as "u.activated", u.role as "u.role" FROM portal_user u INNER JOIN user_permission up ON up.user_id = u.id WHERE up.project_id = #{id}

SELECT u.id as "u.id", u.email as "u.email", u.password as "u.password", u.first_name as "u.first_name", u.last_name as "u.last_name", u.access_token as "u.access_token", u.activated as "u.activated", u.role as "u.role" FROM portal_user u

SELECT u.id as "u.id", u.email as "u.email", u.password as "u.password", u.first_name as "u.first_name", u.last_name as "u.last_name", u.access_token as "u.access_token", u.activated as "u.activated", u.role as "u.role" FROM portal_user u WHERE u.access_token = #{token}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_token (user_id, auth_token, update_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{authToken}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as "u.id", u.email as "u.email", u.password as "u.password", u.first_name as "u.first_name", u.last_name as "u.last_name", u.access_token as "u.access_token", u.activated as "u.activated", u.role as "u.role" FROM auth_token t join portal_user u on t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.auth_token = #{authToken}
